overview: In the 20s, during the Civil War, a unique case arises - a Russian general of German origin leads the Equestrian Division and liberates Mongolia from Chinese invaders. Without losing faith in the return of the Russian monarchy, he is advancing from Siberia, occupied by the Bolsheviks. The new Genghis Khan named Roman Fedorovich Baron von Ungern-Sternberg has no idea that the "Western evil" of the revolution will be omnipotent. For the next hundred years.
title: The Last Campaign of the Baron
